name: Exchangeable Hearts
description:
Can you imagine dating your favorite cryptocurrency? 

Nope, am I right? Well, now you can! Enroll in Crypto High, where you have to prepare a presentation on the modern economy with a lovely partner.

Meet BitCoin, Ethereum, DogeCoin, LiteCoin, BitConnect, and FuturoCoin. Discover their secrets. Fall in love. And learn about cryptocurrencies along the way!

Why does this game exist?

Good question. I decided to make a fun and cringy visual novel for my co-workers as a "thank you" present. Exchangeable Hearts was made in the span of 3 weeks. It has more than 60 images, 6 special ones to unlock with happy ending included. 

Disclaimer: This visual novel is a fan-based parody. Topics and opinions presented in this visual novel are not officially endorsed or supported by the organizations.
